item.title: Gadwal Collector felicitated for excellence in governance
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District Collector BM Santhosh was felicitated by officials on Monday in recognition of receiving an award from the Governor Vishnu Dev Varma at Raj Bhavan.
The award was presented for the Collector’s performance in six key indicators as part of the ‘Aspirational Districts Program’ undertaken by NITI Aayog to improve underdeveloped districts.
Earlier, he directed officials to give top priority to the grievances received through the Prajavani programme and resolve them promptly. On the ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
